title: 1 BR with a Direct View of the Bay Plus Balcony
posting_body: ['Jasper', '514 Harrison Street, San Francisco, CA, 94105', 'See our property details here:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'for more information.', 'SETTLE FOR EXTRAORDINARY', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 619 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Jasper is a convergence.', 'Of structure and imagination.', 'Of the classic and the eclectic.', 'Of art and life.', 'This 400-foot high-rise apartment building crowns San Francisco’s fabled The East Cut and stands as an iconic addition to the city skyline.', 'It is a statement about elegance in a place where elegance actually means something.', '<URL>', 'Features', '- Pre', '-wired for telephone, data and TV', '- Window seats*', '- Caesarstone countertops', '- Room of all trades*', '- Garbage disposal', '- Hansgrohe faucets', '- Full-size vented washer and dryer', '- Expansive vistas from floor-to-ceiling windows', '- Fiber-optic cable provides fastest Internet connection in the San Francisco Bay Area', '- Stainless steel Bosch cooking suite and built-in dishwasher', '- Soaking tub*', '- Roller shades', '- Gas stovetop', '- Apartments with balconies and terraces*', '- Light ash-finished hardwood floor', '- Bertazzoni speed oven*', '- Stainless steel Fisher & Paykel refrigerator*', '- Slow-close cabinets and drawers', '- Keyless entry for residence doors', '- Dual-zone air conditioning and heating', '*Select units', 'Community Amenities', '- Intelligent mobile technology that preemptively alerts Concierge upon entry and exit', '- Business center with printing, copying, and scanning', '- Resident service coordinator', '- WiFi throughout common areas', '- Club lounge with interactive video wall', '- On-demand car wash and detailing', '- Bike repair room and storage', '- Resident storage', '- Laundry and dry cleaning services', '- Designed according to LEED® Silver certification from the US Green Building Council', '- Boardrooms with video conferencing and conference tables', '- Gym / fitness center', '- Dog wash and grooming station', '- In-unit package delivery', '- Valet for residents and guests', '- Pet friendly apartments', '- Indoor/outdoor pool, hot tub and saunas', '- Interactive touchscreen technology for valet, deliveries and navigating building information, powered by Riseio', '- Internet at warp speed—the fastest in San Francisco', '- On-site movie theater', '- Curated art collection', '- Food delivery storage for perishables and dry goods', '- Digital antenna for optimized cell coverage', '- App-based resident management', '- Bike share', '- Destination-entry elevators', '- 24/7 concierge', '- Car charging stations', 'This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.', '55Y7IvFc']
